summary: Completed comprehensive testing of police patrol attendance tracking application. Backend APIs are fully functional with 25/26 tests passing. Frontend authentication, admin dashboard, and officer dashboard are working correctly. Minor UI integration issue with route assignment dropdown selection.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_issues.impact: Cosmetic - both status codes indicate unauthorized access correctly

ui_bugs.issue: Officer dropdown selection fails with timeout when trying to select by label
ui_bugs.workaround: Manual selection works, API backend functions correctly

passed_tests: Officer: No route assigned state display
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix officer dropdown selection in route assignment dialog - the select option by label is timing out. Consider using select by value instead of label, or investigate if the officer data is properly loaded when the dialog opens.
